channel.title: authentication on Fumbles and stumbles with StatusHat

item.title: Do one thing or do no things at all
item.description: It’s been slow going for some time. I keep falling down some wiki rabbithole or being distracted by some maybe cool thing to try, and ending up getting nothing done. So I finally managed to focus on just one thing for long enough that I managed to do at least one thing…
